comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_7_2) AppleWebKit/534.51.22 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.1.1 Safari/534.51.22

Steps to reproduce:

I open a page in Firefox on Lion OX.  


Actual results:

The browser becomes unresponsive periodically for no apparent reason.  I can have 2-3 tabs opened and working, then go to another program, come back and cannot click on anything.  Then I have to quit and restart it.  Basically it is unusable on Lion OX 10.7.2.  The issue did not occur in Firefox 7


Expected results:

The browser should not freeze.
comments.creator: tzigularov@yahoo.com
